thread.title: Great little hotel in Monmartre.
thread.title_full: Great little hotel in Monmartre. - Review of Hotel des Arts - Montmartre, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: RKMack
title: Great little hotel in Monmartre.
text:
Found this hotel on TripAdvisor and really glad we stayed there! Although the room was tiny, it had everything we needed and the staff was attentive and helpful throughout our stay.
The rooms have no AC, but they found us a fan when we asked for one. The lift is very small also; this was only really a problem when we had luggage with us though.
This was also a great neighborhood with some fantastic little bistros and shops right down the road.
I highly recommend this hotel.
Room Tip: The beds were a bit smaller than expected but the location and staff were fantastic. See more room tips
